item.title: Jsonquiz CorCTF 2022 writeups
item.author: James S
item.description: Jsonquiz CorCTF 2022 writeups We were given the link jsonquiz.be.ax. I googled the questions and found that they are the same as in https://quizack.com/json/questions-and-answers . Just searched the page for the answer. I opened the network inspect tool just in case. After i answered question 15, there was a post request with payload “score=0” I copied the request as cUrl curl ‘https://jsonquiz.be.ax/submit' -X POST –data-raw ‘score=0’ change it to:
